text: The 56th Infantry Division (, 56-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army. ==Organization== *1st Brigade **221st Roslav Infantry Regiment **222nd Krasnan Infantry Regiment *2nd Brigade **223rd Odoev Infantry Regiment **224th Yukhnov Infantry Regiment *56th Artillery Brigade ==References== Category:Infantry divisions of the Russian Empire
title: 56th Infantry Division (Russian Empire)
